org.openhab.binding.velux.internal.bridge.json

Interface JsonBridgeCommunicationProtocol

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BridgeCommunicationProtocol
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JCgetDeviceStatus, JCgetFirmware, JCgetLANConfig, JCgetProducts, JCgetScenes, JCgetWLANConfig, JClogin, JClogout, JCrunProductDiscovery, JCrunProductIdentification, JCrunProductSearch, JCrunScene, JCsetSceneVelocity

    @NonNullByDefault
interface JsonBridgeCommunicationProtocol
extends BridgeCommunicationProtocol
    Common JSON-based bridge communication message scheme supported by the Velux bridge.

    This bridge communication is an extension of the common BridgeCommunicationProtocol.

    Message semantic will be defined by the implementation of the separate message classes, which are defined within JsonBridgeAPI.

    The implementations will define the information which to send query and receive answer through the VeluxBridgeProvider.

    (Methods in this interface for the appropriate interaction:

    • getURL() to return the URL suffix for accessing the specific service access point.
    • getObjectOfRequest() to return the request object for further JSON serialization.
    • getClassOfResponse() to retrieve the class of the object of response message for further JSON deserialization.
    • setResponse(java.lang.Object) for storing the response according to the desired class after JSON deserialization.
    • getDeviceStatus() to retrieve the current device status.
    • getErrors() to retrieve the current error status.
    Author:
    Guenther Schreiner - Initial contribution.

      • getDeviceStatus

        Returning the communication status included within the response message.

      • getErrors

        Returns:
